participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, Emma loves to explore and create stories in her mind.
participant_1.background: i play with my friends on the playground. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i love to go to disney world every year. i'm in the third grade.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and daring, Jake enjoys trying new tricks on his skateboard and pushing his limits.
participant_2.background: i am a skateboarder. my favourite skater is rob dryden. i'm always wearing a hat. my friends are all skateboarders. i have a broken arm.
